snippet.title: Lucasfilm Games' Night Shift - Intro
snippet.description:
This is the intro scenes for the old Lucasfilm Games classic Night Shift.

The sound cuts out just before the gameplay demo starts.  It's not an error in the video.  The game can't play music and load the level at the same time.
